htmlQuestions.question: Which tag is used to create a hyperlink in HTML?
What does the 'alt' attribute in the image tag provide?
Which HTML tag is used to define an unordered list?
What is the purpose of the HTML <head> element?
options: To define the main content of the HTML document
To define the structure of the HTML document
To contain metadata about the HTML document
To define a header for the HTML document
htmlQuestions.correctAnswer: To contain metadata about the HTML document

htmlQuestions.question: Which HTML tag is used to define a table?
What is the purpose of the HTML <meta> tag?
options: To define metadata about an HTML document
To define a link to an external resource
htmlQuestions.correctAnswer: To define metadata about an HTML document

htmlQuestions.question: Which HTML tag is used to create an ordered list?
In HTML, what does the acronym DOCTYPE stand for?
What is the purpose of the HTML <footer> element?
options: To define the main content of the HTML document
To define a footer for the HTML document
To define metadata about the HTML document
htmlQuestions.correctAnswer: To define a footer for the HTML document

cssQuestions.question: Which CSS property is used to change the text color of an element?
What is the purpose of the CSS 'box-sizing' property?
options: To define the layout of the box
To include padding and border in the total width and height of the box
To set the background color of the box
To control the visibility of the box
cssQuestions.correctAnswer: To include padding and border in the total width and height of the box

cssQuestions.question: Which CSS property is used to control the spacing between elements?
What is the purpose of the CSS 'float' property?
options: To move an element to the left or right
To add a shadow to the element
To change the font style of the element
cssQuestions.correctAnswer: To move an element to the left or right

cssQuestions.question: Which CSS property is used to control the font size of text?
What is the purpose of the CSS 'position' property?
options: To control the spacing between elements
To set the position of an element in the document
To define the layout of the box
To change the color of the text
cssQuestions.correctAnswer: To set the position of an element in the document

cssQuestions.question: Which CSS property is used to add rounded corners to an element?
In CSS, what does the 'opacity' property control?
What is the purpose of the CSS 'flexbox'?
options: To control the spacing between elements

jsQuestions.question: Which keyword is used to declare a variable in JavaScript?
What is the result of the following expression: 5 + '10'?
What is the purpose of the JavaScript 'if' statement?
options: To make decisions based on a condition
jsQuestions.correctAnswer: To make decisions based on a condition

jsQuestions.question: Which built-in method returns the length of a string in JavaScript?
What is the purpose of the JavaScript 'function' keyword?
Which operator is used for strict equality in JavaScript?
How do you comment out multiple lines in JavaScript?
What is the purpose of the JavaScript 'for' loop?
Which built-in object is used to perform mathematical operations in JavaScript?
